thread.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Loves These Three People The Most And It Doesn't Include Abhishek Bachchan
thread.title_full: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Loves These Three People The Most And It Doesn't Include Abhishek Bachchan

title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Loves These Three People The Most And It Doesn't Include Abhishek Bachchan
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan 's most awaited film Jazbaa has released today. The diva, who is making a comeback with this film, recently revealed the names of three people she loves the most. And it does not include her husband Abhishek Bachchan .Aishwarya Rai Bachchan in a recent interview to TOI, was asked who she loves the most in this world, to which Aishwarya said that her daughter Aaradhya Bachchan and her parents Vrinda and Krishnaraj. OMG: This Famous Actress Got Uncomfortable While Getting Romantic With Shahrukh Khan Talking about her parents, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan said, ''I have a very realistic family. I have always sat down without any rebellion or fight and talked out everything with them about each of my decisions. They have never handled my career or had any meetings for me. I always did that myself as in my head, this was my career.'' 
Now that Jazbaa has released Aishwarya Rai Bachchan is all set to leave for London to shoot for Karan Johar's Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. And Aaradhya Bachchan will also accompany her mom as Aishwarya always takes her little bundle of joy with her, even to her shootings.
